Come check out our poster: Repetition Improves Language Model Embeddings at #ICLR2025!

We convert autoregressive language models into high quality text embedders—optionally wihout additional training—just by repeating the input.

Yap score tracking task in action.

ChatGPT did a web search and also pulled info from X.  This shows how easy it is to have untrusted data in a chat that might manipulate result.

We're excited to announce we’ve launched several improvements to ChatGPT search, and today we’re starting to roll out a better shopping experience.

Search has become one of our most popular & fastest growing features, with over 1 billion web searches just in the past week

Improved Citations

ChatGPT can now include multiple citations for a given response, allowing you to learn more or verify information across more sources. 

We’ve also added a new ‘highlight’ UI to more clearly show which part of the answer the citation refers to.

Trending and Autocomplete

You can search faster with trending searches and autocomplete suggestions.
